description:
Dash wants to explore the deep blue waters of Firefly Lagoon! 
Help Dash go for a swim.

puzzles.description: Make Dash automatically turn on blue lights.
puzzles.introduction: The waters of Firefly lagoon are a pretty shade of blue.

hints.description: Link the state with an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After turning on the light, make Dash automatically turn left with the left wheel set to 30 cm/s and the right wheel set to 40 cm/s.

hints.description: Drag out the Moving Basics state. Set the left wheel to 30 cm/s and the right wheel to 40 cm/s. Link the state with an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After turning left, make Dash instantly play the Tugboat sound.

hints.description: Drag out the sound state. Set the sound to Tugboat. Link the state with an Instant cue.

puzzles.description: After the sound, make Dash wait for 1.0 s then turn right with the left wheel set to 40 cm/s and the right wheel set to 30 cm/s.

hints.description: Drag out a new Moving Basics state. Set the left wheel to 40 cm/s and the right wheel to 30 cm/s. Link the state with a Wait For cue set to 1.0 s.

puzzles.description: After turning right, make Dash instantly play a new Tugboat sound. Then make Dash wait for 1.0 s and turn left again.

hints.description: Link the second Moving Basics to the new Tugboat sound using an Instant cue. Link the same sound to the first Moving Basics using a Wait For cue set to 1.0 s.
